Package drawEqu

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    drawing
    This class generate the drawing from an equation that's already made and saved on a file it uses graphics to draw
    houghLine
    it represents an equation for each line generated from the hough transform this equation depends on an angle(theta) and a perpendicular line (R)
    houghTransform
    This is the class which forms the hough transform which is a method for detecting lines in an image along with canny's line detection
    projectRun
    This class controls the interface of the project it also has objects from the rest of the classes created in this project
